item.title: As the End Draws Near
item.description: [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|(People of the Earth,]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|you are reconciled that this]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|is the last night of the world.)]] [[songs/f/faith_no_more/angel_dust/midlife_crisis.md#youre-perfect-yes-its-true-vyl-wnanory|[This is the last night of the world?
